title: Create Go backend scaffold and JSON persistence store
description: Initialize backend module, server bootstrap, health check endpoint, expense data models, and file-backed store with atomic writes.
acceptance_criteria: backend/go.mod and backend/main.go exist and build with go build
GET /healthz returns 200 with status payload
Store persists expenses using versioned envelope JSON
Store safely handles concurrent read/write access

title: Implement expense CRUD API and request validation
description: Add list/create/get/update/delete handlers for expenses, route wiring, payload validation, and canonical error responses.
acceptance_criteria: GET/POST /api/expenses are implemented
GET/PUT/DELETE /api/expenses/:id are implemented
Invalid payloads return 400 and missing IDs return 404
Expenses are returned sorted newest first

title: Add categories and stats endpoints with backend tests
description: Implement GET /api/categories and GET /api/stats, including category aggregation logic and regression tests for calculations.
acceptance_criteria: GET /api/categories returns normalized category list
GET /api/stats returns total, count, average, and category totals
Stats values update correctly after create/update/delete operations
go test ./... includes handler and aggregation coverage

title: Scaffold React + Vite + Tailwind frontend and API client
description: Create frontend project with Tailwind setup, base layout shell, and typed API client hooks for backend endpoints.
acceptance_criteria: frontend/package.json and Tailwind configuration exist
npm run build succeeds for frontend
API client supports expenses, categories, and stats endpoints
Base dashboard layout renders with loading and error states

title: Implement expense form, filtered list, and category breakdown dashboard
description: Build the interactive expense entry form, category filter/list views, stats cards, and chart/summary for category totals.
acceptance_criteria: User can create expenses from UI with inline validation
Expense list supports category filtering and item deletion
Dashboard displays totals, count, average, and category breakdown
Frontend refreshes data after create/update/delete without full page reload

title: Run end-to-end verification and finalize run documentation
description: Validate backend/frontend builds, run endpoint smoke checks, and update README with local run and test instructions.
acceptance_criteria: Backend builds and tests pass
Frontend build passes
All required API endpoints verified via smoke checks
README documents setup, run commands, and key API routes
